The Good Place



"Bad people in heaven" is a silly premise for a show, and while The Good Place is plenty silly, it's also downright brilliant. If you haven't watched any of Kristen Bell's NBC series, you should know to avoid reviews at all cost — this is one sitcom you can definitely spoil. It's the perfect summer show in that it's bite-sized, perfectly bingeable, and full of bright, fun colors that won't make you feel quite so bad about staying inside. (At least it's sunny on the screen!) Season 1 is available on Netflix.



Season 3 of the series will debut September 27, 2018.
